headline: National Poultry Show - in pictures
text: Enthusiasts inspect birds held in cages Photograph: Peter Macdiarmid/Getty Images       Judge Malcolm Thompson inspects eggs Photograph: Peter Macdiarmid/Getty Images       Judge Malcolm Thompson opens an egg for inspection Photograph: Peter Macdiarmid/Getty Images       Judge Mike Porter inspects a Malay Photograph: Peter Macdiarmid/Getty Images       First prize-winning bird in the Best White category Photograph: Peter Macdiarmid/Getty Images       Two breeders chat at the National Poultry Show Photograph: Peter Macdiarmid/Getty Images       Visitors walk among rows of cages containing birds. Thousands of people have attended the Poultry Club's 2012 national show Photograph: Peter Macdiarmid/Getty Images       White leghorn bantam chickens up for sale Photograph: Peter Macdiarmid/Getty Images       Visitors look at the different birds that are up for sale Photograph: Peter Macdiarmid/Getty Images
